name: built-in
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If a place or piece of equipment has built-in objects, they are permanently connected and cannot be easily removed.

example.eg: All the rooms have built-in cupboards/wardrobes.
example.egtrans: 所有的房间都安装了嵌入式壁橱／衣橱。

trans_examp.trans_en: A built-in quality is an original part of something or someone and cannot be separated from it, him, or her.

example.egtrans: 内在的优势／固有的问题
